schema_name.description: A descriptive name for the schema

schema_description.description: A longer description of the schema

attribution.description: An attribution statement, which may include HTML such as links

sources.description: A list of sources from which features should be extracted, specified as a list of names

url.description: URL to download this file from if not present at `local_path`

local_path.description: Local path to the file to use, inferred from `url` if missing

tag_mappings.description: Specifies that certain tag key should have their values treated as being a certain data type

output.description: The name of the typed key that will be presented to the attribute logic

layers.description: A list of vector tile layers and their definitions

features.description: A list of features contained in this layer

geometry.description: Include objects of a certain geometry type

source.description: A source or list of sources from which features should be extracted

min_tile_cover_size.description: include objects of a certain geometry size, where 1.0 means "is the same size as a tile at this zoom"

include_when.description: A tag specification which determines which features to include. If unspecified, all features from the specified sources are included

exclude_when.description: A tag specification which determines which features to exclude. This rule is applied after `includeWhen`. If unspecified, no exclusion filter is applied.

min_zoom.description: Minimum zoom to show the feature that matches the filter specifications.

zoom_override.description: List of rules that overrides the `min_zoom` for this feature if certain tags are present. If multiple rules match, the first matching rule will be applied.

min.description: Minimum zoom to render a feature matching this rule

tag.description: List of tags for which this rule applies. Tags are specified as a list of key/value pairs

attributes.description: Specifies the attributes that should be rendered into the tiles for this feature, and how they are constructed

key.description: Name of this attribute in the tile

type.description: Type of the attribute to map to

anyOf.description: The key that triggered this element to match
The value for the key that triggered this element to match

constant_value.description: Value of the attribute in the tile, as a constant

tag_value.description: Value of the attribute in the tile, as copied from the value of the specified tag key. If neither constantValue nor tagValue are specified, the default behavior is to set the tag value equal to the input value (pass-through)

include_when.description: A filter specification which determines whether to include this attribute. If unspecified, the attribute will be included unless excluded by `excludeWhen`

exclude_when.description: A filter specification which determines whether to exclude this attribute. This rule is applied after `includeWhen`. If unspecified, no exclusion filter is applied.

min_zoom.description: The minimum zoom at which to render this attribute

min_zoom_by_value.description: Minimum zoom to render this attribute depending on the value. Contains a map of `value: zoom` entries that indicate the minimum zoom for each possible value

anyOf.description: A single value for the key
A list of possible values for the key

items.description: One of the possible values for the key
